text: Bactriola falsa is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Martins and Galileo in 1992. It is known from Brazil.BioLib.cz - Bactriola falsa. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Forsteriini Category:Beetles described in 1992
title: Bactriola falsa
